Recommendations: 1. Encourage all faculty members to be involved in individual or team research to develop their passion and culture for such.
2. Technology generated from researches may be submitted. for patent or copyright and may be commercialized to generate income for the college.
3. It is encouraged that faculty members should conduct action researches to improve the content and the delivery of the teaching-learning process.
4. It is encouraged that research output may be utilized for extension, instruction and institutional development of the college.
